last_episode_to_air.name: Who Killed Katie Autry?
last_episode_to_air.overview: The community of Bowling Green, Kentucky is devastated when a student is assaulted and burned in her college dorm room. After the victim succumbs to her injuries without naming her attacker, police find two suspects with very different stories.

name: Southern Gothic
overview: The South can be as shadowy as the muddy waters that run through it, especially when it comes to crime. This true crime docuseries is an exploration of the duplicitous characters, unique settings and boundless mysteries of the American South.
